content:
Sure, here is an example visually appealing art style description for futuristic shaman art:

"Experience the mystical world of futuristic shamanism with our latest art style - Cyber Shamanism! This style blends together traditional shamanic motifs with futuristic technology to create a truly unique and visually striking experience. With Cyber Shamanism, you'll witness ethereal energy fields and cybernetic implants combined in a seamless fusion of organic and technological elements. Let the electrifying colors and textures transport you to a realm beyond our world."

And here are the three commands for creating images of futuristic shamans in aerial, kingdom, and natural styles:
```vbnet
/prefer option set option:futuristic_shaman_aerial value: - cybernetic shaman in a futuristic cityscape::5 shaman with glowing tattoos, surrounded by neon lights and hovering drones::4 digital painting with bright, electric colors and sharp, angular lines::3 blue and purple tones, a dreamy atmosphere, and a sense of floating in the air::3 no clear horizon line or discernible objects in the background::-2

/prefer option set option:futuristic_shaman_kingdom value: - shamanic leader in a futuristic kingdom::5 shaman wearing a crown, standing on a grand throne with high-tech decorations::4 royal outfit with glowing patterns, ornate background design, and a hint of supernatural power::3 fantasy color scheme with gold, silver, and purple, intricate details and majestic composition::3 no cyber elements, no sci-fi elements, and no overtly technological designs::-2

/prefer option set option:futuristic_shaman_natural value: - shamanic figure in a futuristic natural environment::5 shaman standing on a cliff overlooking a technologically advanced city::4 a mix of natural and technological elements in the background, with glowing plants and animals::3 color palette dominated by green and blue, with a sense of organic growth and natural power::3 no harsh, sharp lines or metallic textures, and no bleak, industrial backdrops::-2
```
Feel free to adjust any of the prompts to fit your desired outcome, and have fun exploring the world of AI-generated art!
